title: BIP 14: Digg Distribution Overview
body:
TLDR; snapshot vote to confirm the conceptual breakdown of the distribution of $DIGG token.

Summary Breakdown of Airdrop:
- 55% Earned Rewards
- 35% Earned Rewards / Badger Stake Days Ratio
- 10% Badger Stake Days

See discussions for definitions of the factors above: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-14-digg-distribution-overview/1210?u=defifrog
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
